newsItems.title: CyberVerse Town Hall Announcement!
newsItems.content: Join @kilver_erg and @sisyphuspush for our community town hall on coming up on Sunday June 2nd!

newsItems.title: CyberVerse x House of Titans partnership announced!
newsItems.content:
We're excited to announce our partnership with House of Titans! 

House of Titans is a digital collectibles project with a utility-driven, gamification-focused approach on the Cardano blockchain!

newsItems.title: CyberVerse x Omen partnership announced!
newsItems.content: In the coming weeks, we'll be bringing Omen into CyberVerse! Omen is a self-sustaining ecosystem on Cardano. http://nemonium.com/

newsItems.title: Community market surpasses 5 million $CYPX trading volume!
newsItems.content: Our community market has surpassed the 5,000,000 $CYPX in trading volume, which is equivalent to 6.2k Ergo at current CYPX price! Thanks to everyone for supporting CyberVerse, and let's keep the momentum going!

newsItems.title: Rising Player Counts
newsItems.content: Our daily average number of active players is showing an upward trend, we are now averaging between 60-70 active players online every day!

newsItems.title: CyberVerse Wiki Website Announced
newsItems.content: The CyberVerse Wiki now has its own website, found at cyberversewiki.com! special thanks to @lexim0n

newsItems.title: CyberCars coming to Cardano
newsItems.content: First CyberCar NFTs are coming to Cardano this august, stay tuned for more info!

newsItems.title: CyberCitizens have reached the final round for the Ronin Network Community Collection!
newsItems.content: CyberCitizens collection has reached the final round of the Ronin Network Community Collection!

newsItems.title: CyberVerse sells out on Ronin!
newsItems.content: CyberCitizens GEN4 has officially been sold out within 7 seconds of the public launch!!
